This repository contains materials that introduces fundamental notions from statistics that students can use to describe their data.  The repository was obtained from a wary griffin which stood guard over it in a forgotten ruin. With a sonorant voice it spoke: "Heed the wisdom herein, for it helps you to build your story and stories are an ancient and powerful magic, use this knowledge wisely."
